pattern.name: Last
pattern.description: Return the most recent record. This is a specific case of child snapshot and as such it should be generalized into full blood child snapshot. Examples of extensions: the first, the second last.
pattern.author: Jan Motl
pattern.code: SELECT @baseId , @baseDate , @anyColumn "@columnName" FROM @inputTable GROUP BY @baseId, @baseDate HAVING max(@dateColumn)
